trigger.description: I/O Database Reads Average Latency
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchange Database(*)\I/O Database Reads Average Latency"].avg(600)}>75
trigger.comments: Please read Technet Article for more details of this counter http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28EXCHG.80%29.aspx

trigger.description: I/O Database Writes Average Latency
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchange Database(*)\I/O Database Writes Average Latency"].avg(600)}>150
trigger.comments: Please read Technet Article for more details of this counter http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28EXCHG.80%29.aspx

trigger.description: OWA Average Response Time is high
Copy Queue Length is high
trigger.comments: Please read Technet Article for more details of this counter http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28EXCHG.80%29.aspx

trigger.description: RPCs Request Failed Percentage is too high
trigger.comments: Please read Technet Article for more details of this counter http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28EXCHG.80%29.aspx

trigger.description: Outstanding RPC Requests is high
trigger.comments: Please read Technet Article for more details of this counter http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28EXCHG.80%29.aspx

trigger.description: OAB Download Tasks Queued are high
Client RPC Failed due to Server Too Busy
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeIS\Client: RPCs Failed: Server Too Busy"].avg(600)}#0
trigger.comments: Please read Technet Article for more details of this counter http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28EXCHG.80%29.aspx

trigger.description: Active Mailbox Delivery Queue Length is too high.
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Active Mailbox Delivery Queue Length"].last(0)}>250
trigger.comments: Active Mailbox Delivery Queue Length is too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Active Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length too high.
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Active Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length"].last(0)}>250
trigger.comments: Active Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Active Remote Delivery Queue Length is too high.
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Active Remote Delivery Queue Length"].last(0)}>250
trigger.comments: Active Remote Delivery Queue Length is too high. ttp://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Aggregate Delivery Queue Length is High
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)"].last(0)}>3000
trigger.comments: Aggregate Delivery Queue Length is higher then the microsoft recommednded. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Aggregate Delivery Queue Length is too High
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)"].last(0)}>5000
trigger.comments: Aggregate Delivery Queue Length is too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Largest Delivery Queue Length too high.
trigger.comments: Largest Delivery Queue Length too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Poison Queue Length is high.
Retry Mailbox Delivery Queue Length too high.
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Retry Mailbox Delivery Queue Length"].last(0)}>250
trigger.comments: Retry Mailbox Delivery Queue Length too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Retry Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length too high.
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Retry Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length"].last(0)}>100
trigger.comments: Retry Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Retry Remote Delivery Queue Length too high.
trigger.expression: {Template Exchange 2010:perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Retry Remote Delivery Queue Length"].last(0)}>100
trigger.comments: Retry Remote Delivery Queue Length too high. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff367923.aspx

trigger.description: Submission Queue Length too high.
Unreachable Queue Length too high.
Microsoft Fibre Channel Platform Registration Service not running.
IIS Admin service not running
Microsoft Exchange Address Book service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Active Directory Topology service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Anti-spam Update service not running
Microsoft Exchange EdgeSync Service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Forms-Based Authentication service not running.
Microsoft Exchange File Distribution service not running.
Microsoft Exchange IMAP4 service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Information Store service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Assistants service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Replication service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Mail Submission service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Monitoring service not running.
Microsoft Exchange POP3 service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Protected Service Host service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Replication service not running.
Microsoft Exchange RPC Client Access service not running.
Microsoft Exchange System Attendant service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Search Indexer not running.
Microsoft Exchange Service Host service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Throttling service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Transport service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Transport Log Search service not running.
Microsoft Search (Exchange) service not running.
Microsoft iSCSI Initiator Service not running.
Microsoft Exchange Server Extension for Windows Server Backup service not running.

item.description: Shows the number of searches using Global Address Book.
Shows the number of pending ActiveSync Commands

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchange Assistants - Per Assistant(*)\Events in Queue"]
item.description: Shows the number of Events in Queues for all Mailbox Assisstants

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchange Database(*)\I/O Database Reads Average Latency"]
item.description: Shows the number of I/O Database Reads Average Latency

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchange Database(*)\I/O Database Writes Average Latency"]
item.description: Shows the number of I/O Database Writes Average Latency
Shows the average response time for requests sent to OWA
Shows the number of users logged in through OWA
Shows the number of requests initiated per sec through OWA
Shows the number of items in Copy Queue Length of Active Databases
Shows the number of items in Replay Queue (on Passive Databases)
Shows the number of RPC Requests Failed Percentage
Shows the number of Outstanding RPC Requests
Shows the number of RPC Requests per sec
Shows the number of OAB download tasks Queued since File Distribution service started.
Shows the number of OAB download tasks completed since File Distribution service started.
Shows the number of LDAP Searches Per Sec
Shows the number of Messages Delivered Per Sec (All Mailboxes)

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeIS\Client: RPCs Failed: Server Too Busy"]
item.description: Shows the number times Client RPCs Failed due to Server Too Busy
Shows the number of Users connected to Information Store

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Active Mailbox Delivery Queue Length"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages in the active mailbox queues.

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Active Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages in the drop directory used by a Foreign connector.

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Active Remote Delivery Queue Length"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages in the active remote delivery queues.

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages queued for delivery in all queues.
Shows the number of messages in the largest delivery queues.
Shows the number of messages in the poison message queue.

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Retry Mailbox Delivery Queue Length"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages in a retry state attempting to deliver a message to a remote mailbox.

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Retry Non-Smtp Delivery Queue Length"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages in a retry state in the non-SMTP gateway delivery queues.

item.key: perf_counter["\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Retry Remote Delivery Queue Length"]
item.description: Shows the number of messages in a retry state in the remote delivery queues.
Shows the number of messages in the submission queue.
Shows the number of messages in the Unreachable queue.
